title: Playoff Preview And Picks For Wild-Card Weekend (Football 01/05)
description:
Will Brinson, Nick Kostos, Pete Prisco and Jason La Canfora get you ready for Wild Card Weekend in the NFL. First, Will and Jason hypothetically rank the playoff teams, without seeding or homefield advantage as factors. Then, it's time for JLC's Scandinavian Death Metal Lock of the Week, and analysis on Bills-Jags. Pete and Nick join for their picks against the spread in all 4 games and a new contest amongst themselves. The guys give extensive breakdowns of Titans-Chiefs, Bills-Jags, Falcons-Rams and Panthers-Saints.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
